a1: You can view and copy colors in HEX (#FF5733), RGB (rgb(255, 87, 51)), or HSL (hsl(14, 100%, 60%)) format.
q2: How many colors can I generate at once?
a2: You can generate between 1 and 50 random colors at a time.
q3: How do I copy a color?
a3: Click on any color swatch to copy its value in the selected format to your clipboard.
a4: Yes, colors are generated using the Web Crypto API for cryptographically secure randomization.
